en-US.title: Reports and Insights
en-US.disclaimer:
For performance and efficiency, where applicable, report data is only loaded for the current month.
Feel free to use the filter form to manipulate the data and get the report you want.
en-US.introduction:
Please select from one of the available reports listed!
Be sure the report has been confirgured by your webmaster.

empty.message:
Oooops!
No reports configuration is available.
Please try creating reports configuration for the collections you wish to view.

form.headline: Reports Filter Options - Select one or more filters to update the report.

reports.headline: Reports
reports.empty: No reports data found for the date range - please adjust dates and try again!

rows.headline: Rows
rows.description: Click or tap on each row for more details.
rows.empty: No reports data found for the date range - please adjust dates and try again!
